API Reference

This section contains the complete API documentation for all LittleBot packages.

C++ API

Hardware Interface

namespace littlebot_base
class LittlebotCommunication : public littlebot_base::LittlebotCommunicationInterface
#include <littlebot_communication.hpp>

Public Functions

LittlebotCommunication(const std::string serial_port)

Constructor for the LittlebotCommunication class.

~LittlebotCommunication()

Deconstructor for the LittlebotCommunication class.

virtual void setCommandVelocities(std::vector<float> velocities) override

Set the command velocities.

virtual std::vector<float> getStatusVelocities() const override

Get the status velocities.

virtual std::vector<float> getStatusPositionsStatus() const override

Get the status positions.

bool start()

Start threads.

This function starts the threads that read and write data to the hardware.

bool stop()

Stop thread that read data from serial port.

This function stops the threads that read and write data to the hardware.

class LittlebotCommunicationInterface
#include <littlebot_communication_interface.hpp>

Subclassed by littlebot_base::LittlebotCommunication

Public Functions

virtual ~LittlebotCommunicationInterface() = default

Deconstructor for the LittlebotCommunicationInterface class.

virtual void setCommandVelocities(std::vector<float> velocities) = 0

Set the command velocities.

virtual std::vector<float> getStatusVelocities() const = 0

Get the status velocities.

virtual std::vector<float> getStatusPositionsStatus() const = 0

Get the status positions.

class LittlebotHardwareComponent : public hardware_interface::SystemInterface
#include <littlebot_hardware_component.hpp>

Public Functions

~LittlebotHardwareComponent() = default

Deconstructor for the LittlebotHardwareComponent class.

std::vector<hardware_interface::CommandInterface> export_command_interfaces() override

Communication

class LittlebotCommunication : public littlebot_base::LittlebotCommunicationInterface

Public Functions

LittlebotCommunication(const std::string serial_port)

Constructor for the LittlebotCommunication class.

~LittlebotCommunication()

Deconstructor for the LittlebotCommunication class.

virtual void setCommandVelocities(std::vector<float> velocities) override

Set the command velocities.

virtual std::vector<float> getStatusVelocities() const override

Get the status velocities.

virtual std::vector<float> getStatusPositionsStatus() const override

Get the status positions.

bool start()

Start threads.

This function starts the threads that read and write data to the hardware.

bool stop()

Stop thread that read data from serial port.

This function stops the threads that read and write data to the hardware.
